overview: With demeanor, looks, and glamorous, women can hold money, hold their chests, and bow down under his Italian leather shoes. Niu Lang Zhijie has a woman of his own but still sells his flesh, dealing with rich women all day long. It is even more related to the mistress of the underworld boss. The truth was revealed, the mistress was killed, and the boss wanted to find the man who made him wear a green hat, and he became involved in a gangster dispute...
title: Midnight Lover
